snippet: The ruling by the Court of Arbitration for Sport cited a lack of evidence, annulling a decision by the international gymnastics federation.
abstract: Court of Arbitration for Sport exonerates six officials who were implicated in a judging scandal, annulling a decision by the governing body for rhythmic gymnastics; cheating was said to have occurred in 2012 in testing rooms across Europe, where judges were seeking to qualify to officiate at elite competitions like 2016 Summer Olympics.
lead_paragraph: The ruling by the Court of Arbitration for Sport cited a lack of evidence, annulling a decision by the international gymnastics federation.

headline.main: Officials in Rhythmic Gymnastics Judging Scandal Are Said to Be Exonerated
